website_summaries.verdict: Propel flavored water offers good value and benefits for active individuals and those who prefer a little sweetness without added sugar.
pros: Earns praise from repeat customers for having pleasant fruit flavors
A good choice for after vigorous activities and workouts, as it contains replenishing electrolytes and vitamins
cons: Contains artificial sweetener, which some consumers say make it taste too sweet
Some cases arrived with close sell-by dates

customer_reviews.title: 400% price increase for reorder!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, and would order often, but not with a 400% price increase!
customer_reviews.author: Krysia

customer_reviews.title: Peach is the best but is priced the worst!
customer_reviews.text: I love Propel and the Peach flavor is by far the best. It's also the hardest to find and I'm guessing that's why it's priced so expensively. I didn't realize that Propel fetched market pricing. The product is fantastic and I order it every month but I have a bit of a bitter taste left in my mouth and it's not from the actual Propel. If this was priced in line with the rest of the Propel I would order a lot more!
customer_reviews.author: JLES

customer_reviews.title: Super great! Just one thing to keep in mind..
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, I live in Los Angeles. It can get really hot during the day and having a cold one is just perfect. They are also great before and during the gym. I also have these in powder form which I use at the gym as intra-workout! There’s just one piece of advise which took me a while to figure out. If you have trouble sleeping like sometimes I do, it may not be a great idea to have these before sleep. I felt that for me, they would wake me up which I guess makes sense due to the electrolytes! So just keep that in mind! Regardless I would greatly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Aristidou

customer_reviews.title: Good electrolyte replacement
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist told me that I need to increase my sodium and electrolyte consumption. He recommended either Gatorade or Propel. I didn’t want to drink all that sugar in the Gatorade, so the Propel is a great option. My favorite flavors are Grap and Black Cherry. Amazon prices are good so it’s easier for me to order them on here. I get really dehydrated and hot when I am outside in the sun and when I am drinking Propel vs water, I can tell a big difference in how I’m feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Cat 333

customer_reviews.title: I love the lemon propel
customer_reviews.text: I love the lemon propel. I am not one who likes to drink water so I can get the water I need to be healthy and enjoy the taste. I also like the fact that there is potassium in each bottle. I find it hard sometimes to find the lemon flavor because it is so well liked.
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: wonderful taste. I have a garden and this taste ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful taste. I have a garden and this taste like fresh strawberries. extra special when you put it in the freezer for about an hour for a crisp cold icee. extra nice is zero calories
customer_reviews.author: gan

customer_reviews.title: Great value sports drink- good flavor without dyes
customer_reviews.text: Amidst the world of gatorade, powerade, body armor, vitamin water, etc, propel is definitely a bit lost. However, I typically find it to be a satisfying sports drink and generally well priced. It's definitely more of a sports drink (full flavor) than some of the flavored waters you find and i like that they don't throw random dyes in there just to "visualize" the flavor (better for your teeth!).
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R

customer_reviews.title: Healthful, yummy & sooo efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Lemon & kiwi-strawberry are my current favorite Propel flavors. My doctor wants me to be drinking a “minerals’-added” water (I don’t need/want Gatorades’ calories & the hunting down of my three liked flavors...) Soooooo nice - rather than hauling bottles around store, out to car, into house; a heavy box arrives at front door, 20 feet from shelving spot!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Propel Orange Water
customer_reviews.text: We drink this water instead of drinking gaterade because it has less sugar. We cater and we stand on our feet a lot therefore, we tend to have muscle cramps. We drink this and it keeps the muscle cramps under control. The orange flavor is very cool and good also. We highly recommend propel.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Use after gardening!
customer_reviews.text: I don't drink this too often because, on the alkalinity scale, it is low. Also, it's not necessary to drink it on a regular basis. But after having done yard work in the humidity, when I have sweated up a storm, it really hits the spot! It replenishes my lost salts and electrolytes! And it tastes good with less sugar than Gatorade.
customer_reviews.author: Allie K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I'm a type 1 diabetic and do a lot of running. The fact this water is sugar free is the thing I loved most about it. The flavor is fabulous and I like the fact it's replenishing what I'm sweating out while on the treadmill. A very good choice! Buy it. I do NOT think you'll regret it...
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! Peach is the only flavor of Propel that doesn't make me cough--the others feel as though they're sticking in my throat. The grocery stores here (Dover, DE) either don't sell the peach flavor or never stock very much. I don't know why it took me so long to realize that I can get it from Amazon . . . cheaper than the grocery stores!
customer_reviews.author: Babasongbird

customer_reviews.title: Propel needs to wake up and step up production
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but way overpriced. Only bought it because our grandson loves the flavor and you can't find it anywhere within a 100 miles of our house. Seems like Propel would step up production since this has been an ongoing problem ever since this product came out.
customer_reviews.author: dlw

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I've loved these things for years but lugging them in from the car is a royal pain. Having them come to me is so much easier! Sometimes I just plain old don't have the time or energy to go trotting off after an item I've run out of. Great selection of flavors I just wish some of them weren't so pricey
customer_reviews.author: ArgentosmomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My New Staple/ Amazon FRESH Is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful value. I am hooked on these. I am drinking more water now with the strawberry/kiwi. Amazon FRESH is a must have. Great values, quality and I suggest everyone should try Amazon FRESH. The first month is free and you get money off your first 4 trial month orders. You will find you are getting a great quality of food and so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best flavor they have....
customer_reviews.text: I been drinking Propel for about 5 years now and I primarily drink it when I am working out. I have 4 of them on subscribe and save on Amazon. Recently, the Lemon was is out of stock so I thought I would try a new flavor. I am not a fan of the overall flavor of grape. I think this is much stronger than the other flavors. Since I drink mostly when I am working out, I am okay with it but unlike the other flavors I would not drink it if I was not working out.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: packaging from Amazon horrific
customer_reviews.text: I cancelled my subscription for Propel. The product is outstanding, however Amazon continues to put these heavy items in with toothpaste, sunscreen and other "mashables" where when I'm unpacking, the propel is bathed in Colgate and Coppertone. Good Grief.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase the Watermelon Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordering Propel grape flavored water for ages and it is delicious. So I thought I'd make a change and try the watermelon. OMG the taste is absolutely HORRID. It took me about 15 soda crackers to get the taste out of my mouth. Now I don't know if my severe case of diarrhea is from tasting this stuff, but I wouldn't rule it out. I am home bound and can not get out to purchase one bottle to see if I like it. As a result, I was stuck with 12 bottle of this water that I can only describe as it's taste as liquid plastic embedded with chalk. I'll stick to the grape flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of the 12 okay!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 12 were crimped @ the neck of the bottle making them undrinkable! I do NOT have a camera/phone to take a picture of the bottles! I was NOT going to PAY to send them back! I had to throw them out! I may reorder them in hope that all 12 are drinkable! kathyhayes206@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My taste-buds and my kidneys love Propel.
customer_reviews.text: Eight years ago my doctor said my kidney readings where 5 points out of normal. He said to drink at least 4 or 5 glasses of water a day. I found Propel kiwi strawberry and loved the taste. I showed my doctor the label. He said it would work just fine, unlike soda and tea which aren't processed by your kidneys the same as water. Eight years later my kidneys are well within normal range. My doctor said that's great for an 80 year old man.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H.

customer_reviews.title: Propel Berry Water
customer_reviews.text: The berry flavor is my favorite flavor! I was so pleased with my order I continued with subscribe and save. It's perfect for me because sometimes my electrolytes are off due to low sodium and potassium. This replenished them without over doing sugar and other vitamins, etc. I don't overdo drinking these supplemental waters, as that can make the levels to too high. People don't seem to understand that sports drinks aren't plain water. Think of them as Pedialyte that we have to our children and babies when they were dehydrated. I find these Propel waters to be perfect for me and my needs. I know Gatorade is effective, too. I simply like this berry flavor better.
customer_reviews.author: bubblechamp

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful water with electrolytes
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like water even though mine is filtered. This is better than water because it has added electrolytes which helps prevent me from being dehydrated. I just grab one and take it in the car or for a walk, whatever. Very good mild grape flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did they make the bottle taller?
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste still and can deal with the price, which is a bit more than in the grocery store. I don't understand why they decided to make the bottle taller because they still contain the same amount of ounces. Unless this is to make it look like more? The height was a perfect fit in the area I always kept them, so the change is a little annoying. I just removed a star for value of money.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Nasty taste
customer_reviews.text: Nasty. Tastes like black cherry juice. I thought it would just be a hint of black cherry taste. Wasted my money. The water had an expiration of July 15, 2019, expiring 3weeks after receipt. Photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyMan52

customer_reviews.title: My favorite drink!
customer_reviews.text: Since having sleeve gastrectomy surgery I am no longer able to drink plain water. Found the watermelon Propel at a local dollar store, grabbed one to try. Loved it. Immediately looked it up on Amazon and scheduled it for monthly delivery via Subscribe & Save! It's a lifesaver for me - gets my water in and the electrolytes have eliminated my foot/calf cramps. WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love this water!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, I love this water. I usually lug a 24 pack in from Walmart but decided to try Amazon. Amazon delivers it to your home in 2 days without having to drive and pick up at Walmart or doing the $35 or $40 minimum order. I drink about 2 per day. It tastes great and I am super picky about water taste and many other things. It has a sweet and very smooth taste. Comes in wide variety of flavors. I like most flavors accept lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo1862

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet and flavors are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The sweetener flavor is so strong you can't taste the berry flavor... way too sweet I can't finish a whole bottle. Note: the flavor isn't correct. Watermelon doesn't taste like watermelon at all... tastes like fruit punch. And the strawberry lemonade tastes like anything but strawberry or lemonade. I think we got scammed with a fake product that was made in someone's basement.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: Service is important
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with Joseph with Cadence Delivery, a subcontractor for Amazon. We are in our early 70’s and the "24 oz Propel" which we order monthly is very heavy to take from the front door to the garage where we store it next to our back-up refrigerator.. Joseph was extremely accommodating to assist me, taking the product to the desired location. We receive 10-12 12 pack packages of propel a month because of my best hydration liquid (120 bottles over 30 days) Amazon has surpassed Nordstroms’s in customer service with associates like Joseph
customer_reviews.author: Electric Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor and Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I used to order the smaller bottles but for the past few months it has been out of stock so I thought I would get the bigger (24 oz) pack. It is still a great deal and cheaper than in store (if order through subscribe and save like I do). I love this flavor as it has a great taste. I drink this when I am working out and have been doing so for about 8 years now. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: You must have to have a required taste for this flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Well I thought that I was getting a flavor water for the wife she wants to lose a few pounds and she was getting tired of plan water so I got this flavor she likes strawberry flavor and kiwi I said yeah she would like this one only thing I can say is wow and not in good way it do taste like it have sugar in it but I think it's just from the natural fruit I think the price is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: David Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: What makes Propel WATER, Different?
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew. There is something about Propel water, itself. You can buy the same flavors in powder; mixed, they taste the same, w same vits etc, as the water -- kiwi strawberry &watermelon are my favs -- but somehow the water, hydrates better. On me, the effect is immediate, even tho I live on mostly liquids. My body instantly reacts as tho it's FINALLY getting real water (compared to whatever else it thought it was getting?) tho I drink Brita-like filtered Houston water, by the qt. Oh well. Yeah, I'll keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: brainout

customer_reviews.title: The lids are impossible to get off
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these at various stores for my mother and got tired of lugging them around. I thought ordering online and having them delivered to my door was the way to go. Unfortunately, neither of us can get the lids off. The ones purchased at Harris Teeter, Kroger, Giant Eagle, and Food Lion have all come off easily. What really hurts is that these cost more than the others as well.
customer_reviews.author: vk

customer_reviews.title: Some are impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: The Propel certainly is good enough but 2 out of the the 4 I have opened, I have not been able to open without a tool box!! The cap is impossible to twist so in order to open the bottle, you either have to give up and pitch it or try your luck with a plier. Even my husband could not open so needless to say, pretty disappointing. I have never experienced this with plastic caps before.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I find myself addicted to watermelon 🍉 flavored water these days. Not all are created equal, but most don’t taste artificial at least, which is a big improvement over yesteryear, in my humble opinion. Propel Watermelon Zero seems to have mastered the right profile! It’s got just the perfect amount of watermelon taste to the water! Get it nice n’ cold, (maybe throw in some real ice cold chunks of real watermelon) and you’ve got yourself a refreshing summer drink, with zero calories, (that your doctor & dentist will approve), that you’ll want to drink all year through! Drink up! 💧
customer_reviews.author: CLipk.

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Has good flavor but some taste watered down like they didn’t put much flavor in them. They have helped me stopping drinking so much Dr. Pepper which is a plus. The ones that have a decent amount of flavor are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pettis

customer_reviews.title: I've been drinking Propel since 2012
customer_reviews.text: I mentioned low long I've used this so people would know I didn't try it once and review it. I have grown tired of some flavors but the Kiwi Strawberry has always been my favorite. It's cheap as far the flavored water market goes and has all the components you want for hydration as well as some B vitamins. There is EDTA which some research has shown to be bad, but some research has shown it could help with plaque buildup in arteries. I'm not a scientist and science changes frequently so it's probably not a good or bad reason to buy your water.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love this peach non-carbonated water!
customer_reviews.text: I tried over the years various flat water peach flavored water. Have not liked any of them until I tried Propel. I’m addicted to it but that’s OK, as very few calories and no sugar. Absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hydration
customer_reviews.text: I have a standing order every 2 weeks. It come in 2 -12 packs for a case. Staying hydrated is a problem for me especially since I spend a lot of time in the sun. I can't consume aspartame because it gives me a headache. I read someone else got a headache but I consume a case every 2 weeks and no issues. It solved my midnight leg cramps and makes me feel better getting enough fluids. My dad is 92 and drinks it because dehydration is a problem for older folks. I buy other flavors occasionally but I'm happy with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: TwikieWonder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn't only thrive your thirst but also helped me in one of the most helpless time I had. I was having those days wherein I was just having a bad stomach day and releasing everything I was eating. The doctor said to drink something with electrolytes and keep myself hydrated. This did all. I got well in 2 days. No medicines just this. I was weak for 2 days before I started taking this. When I started taking this in 2 days I stopped releasing and started recovery. I recommend this if you are in the same situation as I was.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel1130

customer_reviews.title: tops do not unscrew!
customer_reviews.text: I buy and drink these all the time. This order was horrible! The tops do not come off! I tried using a rubber opener, a towel and finally used a wrench, a wrench to unscrew the top! Ridiculous that they are packaged so poorly. I think this pack may have been defective. I have a blister on my finger to prove it!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: My favorite drink.
customer_reviews.text: I love this drink. It is just faintly grape flavored. I pay much more for Propel in local stores. This is a great deal. I'm not a big water drinker, but with this little bit of added flavor I can drink 2 or 3 a day if I allow myself to.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Can't find the strawberry lemonade ones in the stores here and they are my favorite love that i can order them when they are in stock and get them delivered next day. Awesome flavor love that they are sugar free and have electrolytes great product always gets delivered very well and undamaged
customer_reviews.author: Barry F

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I had four cases delivered. Two of the cases came in a separate box. Clearly the bottles were open because the box with the single two cases of propel water were full of thousands of ants. I left home for approximately 15 minutes to return home to this mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Propel watermelon flavor, is the best...
customer_reviews.text: Whats to review..its a drink.. well here we go, its my go to drink. Its pretty much all i drink, and my favorite flavor of propel. Cant beat the price. Sometimes shipping is way faster than other times. Like weeks. But its always worth the $ and wait. They are not easy to come by locally. They sell out super fast around here. So amazon is like my only other option. And seems to be popular on here too. Price is great. Zero calories which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and not tart or sour
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of this flavored water. The lemon flavor is my favorite, but I am just as happy with the other flavors. The lemon is not sour tasting, as I have experienced with some other brands lemon flavored waters. I have never been a big water drinker and this has helped me get into a habit of reaching for water instead of a diet soda or some other low calorie drink with ingredients that I can't even pronounce. I recommend this water to all my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do your research before purchasing, it could be your health
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great, until I started having horrible stomach issues. After learning about the ingredients of propel, and the stomach issues it can cause. I immediately stopped drinking it. My stomach issues subsided. I recommend you look up the ingredients and read them carefully before you purchase. I pay attention to what I put in my body. I didn't dig deep enough. I mean it's just flavored water right? WRONG. Do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Sett

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Not only does it taste delicious, and doesn't taste too acidic, but it revived my energy! I have a condition where I dehydrate easily. Pedialyte was good, but I didn't need that much sodium. This water kept a lower dose, steady stream of electrolytes in my system, and after one day, I felt way more energized! It's tasty, and like drinking water, not salt water! My definite new hydration beverage for daily use. (Pedialyte, when it's extremely bad) . 😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: KimberKat

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the carton that the waters came in had a huge hole in it, and the waters that were above the hole also had holes in them of course, so they leaked out all of their contents at the warehouse before they were even packed. I know it happened at the warehouse and not during transit because the box that it was shipped in was perfect with no hole in it and no water damage that 3 full bottles of water would have caused. So that means that it was intentionally packed with the hole already in the box, and the waters already drained.
customer_reviews.author: CRTreeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Hooked for life. if you don't drink regular water, try Propel
customer_reviews.text: for years I wouldn't drink plain water. goes back to childhood when my medicine was crushed up and put in a tsp of water, gross tasting 3 times a day for months on end. I took a chance one day and tried Propel Grape. I was hooked. I try to get it on sale, but if not possible, then amazon has decent prices.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Propel Lemon 24 oz not the same water as Propel Lemon 18.9 oz.
customer_reviews.text: 24 oz Propel Lemon has a different taste, not as good as the 18.9 oz propel. My Doctor instructed me to drink Lemon Propel water because my Sodium level was dangerously low and I needed to drink a high sodium drink. I was buying and drinking the 18.9 oz bottle which has 230 mg of sodium. I ordered Propel Lemon with the 24 oz bottles and noticed an unusual taste so I looked at the nutrition facts and discovered Sodium level is 160 mg. Is this "bait and switch" since both bottles look identical?
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great rehydration drink & 24 oz size of bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great package of the 24 oz bottles of Propel which we cannot find in our local stores. The flavor is very good, but we wish they would offer many more flavor choices which we would also purchase if available. Covid19 has affected the delivery & availability in many flavors. It's still my favorite enhanced water product for rehydration when outside in the heat & humidity. Will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: kbsfamily

customer_reviews.title: Ambrosia of the Gods
customer_reviews.text: I seriously would die without this stuff. I go through at least six bottles a day. I was able to cut out soda and milk entirely by switching to Propel and the occasional glass of tea. I live off Propel. When my town grocery store stopped carrying it, I thought all was lost, but thankfully Amazon carried it (and cheaper than the store did!)
customer_reviews.author: Shandod

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really love this flavor. My husband liked this whereas he does not like my flavored seltzer waters as he thinks the flavors are weak. This is not a weak flavor. We finally agree on a zero calorie drink. I also like the idea that there arae electrolytes in there too.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: Quenches the thirst. Love the strawberry lemonade flavor! I do wish it was more affordable by a dollar at least, but it’s good overall!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: My workout water!
customer_reviews.text: I love propel! It is my favorite flavored water and the only brand I use when I workout/go to the gym. I have a Subscribe and Save for three flavors (Kiwi Strawberry and Strawberry Lemonade being the other two). The price with S&S is the cheapest I found anywhere and I will continue to order from Amazon. I like that the water had a good flavor, it is not too strong and not too heavy. I sometimes even have it with dinner because I love the taste (with the added benefit that it is 0 calories)!
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch or don’t care for taste?
customer_reviews.text: They were out of black cherry, which has a great taste, so I bought grape- it has a bitter aftertaste- as if something was wrong. Unfortunately, I bought 2 cases and no returns. I hate to dispose but I have no choice. How does one know, if it is a bad batch or just don’t care for the taste? In addition, I purchased kiwi strawberry weeks ago, also terrible. Bad batch?
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Best Tastey Lemon Water on the market
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I don't like about this water. I was drinking coke, like 8 cans at work a day, I wanted something with less sugar. I tried plain water, cant drink it. I even tried to put lemons in it, the lemon flavor was good but it was a pain keeping lemons in the office. I am now only drinking this water, its perfect! Not too sweet not too bitter. This is all I drink! Its very hard to find in stores in my area, so I have turned to Amazon to have it sent to me! I keep some at home and some for work. The lightly carbonation helps me not miss drinking Coke!
customer_reviews.author: Edwardsma

customer_reviews.title: Love this flavor
customer_reviews.text: A few summers ago I was shopping with my grandchild in a large grocery store. I became hot and lightheaded and asked my grandchild to please go get me some water. She came back with this instead, her favorite flavor. She said I needed this more than just plain water. She was right. I perked up fairly quickly, bought more of these, and now always have them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Flavor of Propel!!
customer_reviews.text: I have these on subscribe and save for over a year now! I love this flavor and it is my favorite. I drink this when I am working out and when I am working late at night (v. drinking coffee). I love that it is zero calories and taste pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: addicted to them
customer_reviews.text: i love this water, about the same price, maybe a little less then shoprite, but totally worth it, i love it i drink at least one a day when im at work, i got three of them, may have gone over board with the prdering but i love this flavor, alot of them are good i like the strawberry lemonade also, if you havent tried it i would recommend getting a variety pack but he warned, once you try it you will be addicted lol
customer_reviews.author: Ginny f.

customer_reviews.title: I am a multi time repeat buyer. The best of all the zero calorie flavored water.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the zero calorie flavored drinks out there, this is my favorite by far. Sweet enough but not too sweet. Flavor is good. No aftertaste like some other zero calorie flavored water. I have bought this many times and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: DKDCDL

customer_reviews.title: good product with one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, and the added vitamins are a plus. I'll never understand why sodium is in a "healthy" water. It's a bit pricey. However, my reason for rating Propel at 4 stars, instead of 5 stars, is The Caps! There is no reason why the caps should be almost impossible to remove. Get a better design -- one that considers that some customers are older with diminished hand strength!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Berry Good
customer_reviews.text: I mostly drink water and every now and then I'll try something sugar free. These were not bad at all. Light flavor and not sweet. I put mine in the freezer to let it get a little slushy. It tastes better to me. If you are looking for something sweet with overbearing flavor, then this may not be for you. Price was affordable shipping was fast and will definitely try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Kepkim

customer_reviews.title: Bad Flavor - chemical taste
customer_reviews.text: Although I generally like watermelon flavored drinks this is one of the few exceptions. The flavor comes with a strong chemical taste. I'm not sure if this is from the flavoring or the sweetener. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend buying this flavor. If you get the chance, try a single bottle first before stocking up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stewart Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Like It!
customer_reviews.text: The taste didn't do a thing for me. I'm sitting here with a whole package of it untouched and not sure I'll ever touch it. I couldn't even get past the first bottle. Maybe it's the flavor, maybe not. Maybe it's because I'm subconsciously comparing it to another drink I've found to be my favorite. Regardless, I'm not impressed ... sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for carbinated drinks
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and drink it regularly. The 'Black Cherry' flavor is at times difficult to find so it is great to be able to purchase it in bulk. The price is also better than what I've found in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Schlumpf

customer_reviews.title: Hydration!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Propel, and I drink it every day, multiple times a day. It tastes good, it replenishes electrolytes, and when purchased on Amazon is relatively affordable. You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love these waters. They're very sweet though so don't get them if you don't like sweet. Strawberry Lemonade is my favorite flavor so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Drink Propel daily
customer_reviews.text: Full of electrolytes Propel offers a variety of flavors to satisfy many. I began drinking Propel when I had pneumonia a couple years ago & haven’t stopped. Watermelon is one of my favorite flavors. I drink this as much as I drink water. It’s a healthy drink & I definitely recommend you try it. amazon offers it as a subscribe & save item so I can order it monthly at a reduced cost. Love PROPEL!!
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much! First off I really like this flavor and no stores around me has it. I didn't really read the description of the product; I just bought it. When I opened it I saw that it was a 12 pack of 24 oz. bottles. That's awesome! I've never found 24 oz. bottles of propel anywhere. Thank you for the speedy delivery. I received it a day early! Thanks guys, keep doing what you're doing!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Howard

customer_reviews.title: 100% is a Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time for an afternoon break and in perfect condition. Carton marked "HEAVY" which alerted me to open the carton where it was delivered so that I could easily carry the products inside. Great taste and half the price of that sold in local grocery and discount stores. Exceptional service when delivering an excellent product at an unbelievably low price. Sadly, the price seems to be going up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Not upset about the water but about how Amazon handled the situation
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely furious with this order as I ordered it before the hurricane came to Florida. I was then informed that it would come after Dorian came. Once it came I was informed that it was on refundable and I do not need it anymore. If Dorian would’ve hit I wouldn’t of had any water
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Propel contains electrolytes with great peach flavor
customer_reviews.text: Propel was suggested to me by yoga instructor as I had problems with severe leg cramps in feet and calves of both legs. I started drinking 4 bottles/day-64 oz and no leg cramps! I did order flavor packets to use in water bottles with purified water but not as effective. I do not know why but no cramps with Propel flavored water with electrolytes.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Water good, shipping NOT
customer_reviews.text: Water is great, the cost is more than locally purchased but more readily available on Amazon. Shipping is absolutely terrible as water is not in the original case when it arrives. Usually, due to the shipper, the exterior case is extremely damaged and I have even had a couple of bottles missing from a shipment.
customer_reviews.author: chopemupgood

customer_reviews.title: Great value great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I love these waters! The fact that these Propel Black Cherry waters are calorie free and sugar free is a real plus. There is a decent amount of sodium though particularly for those days when you need those extra electrolytes these waters are perfect. I have tried many other low calorie and sugar free flavored waters in the past, though the black cherry is definitely my favorite. The value of these waters is great also, and the order arrived fairly quickly. I would definitely recommend this seller and these waters!
customer_reviews.author: Rhia C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor and the price
customer_reviews.text: I like Propel water in general but the Kiwi Strawberry is my favorite flavor. I used to purchase these for my household at big box stores but for the current prices on amazon (I paid about $6.50 for 12) the price is slightly cheaper than the store and I can just choose the flavor I want. Having it shipped to my door is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Harken

customer_reviews.title: great flavor but too sweet
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love with strawberry lemonade flavored drinks and he's been trying to cut back on the carbs and sugar so I had to grab these when I found them. They were well packaged. It has a great flavor, but it's a tad too sweet for me. My husband was pleased with them though.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Probably not
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I was looking for a low sugar water type drink. I like watermelon but this flavoring was more like an overly diet sweeter kind of flavor. I did not like it. Even the kids thought it was weird and they eat/drink anything loaded with sugar. haha I switched to Bolt and those are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and product. Same price as Wally world and I don't have to leave the house. Our son has also discovered how good these are so will be purchasing more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Mookie

customer_reviews.title: Another great flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few propel flavors on Amazon's Subscribe and Save program and this is one of my favorites. I like that the watermelon is not too sweet and too subtle either. It has a great taste that I can drink when I am working out or even drink while I am eating a meal! It is not too overpowering so you can still enjoy your meal.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Propel, it's gulpable.
customer_reviews.text: very light mild sweet taste - gulpable. If you're not into water - but ready to give up soda ... THIS is the drink to end with. Unlike the flashy other sports drinks ... with popping flavor that will curdle your toes ... eventually you settle down into a mode where you just want to replace your electrolytes with some drink that wont leave you heaving. This product doesn't leave you heaving.
customer_reviews.author: runCMD

customer_reviews.title: Bottles delivered have solid matter floating in the water. Also expire in 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking Propel water for years. I recently subscribed through Amazon. The bottles from my last shipment have solid matter floating in the water. Also, the expiration date was 2-3 weeks from when I received the shipment. Normally, the expiration date is several months away from the time I purchase the Propel. I am having difficulty getting in touch with a live person who can help rectify this situation. I have filled out forms, but have had no response so far from Amazon. I would like a refund for the bad water, but I would like to know why they are sending out items with expiration dates occurring so soon. These are old products.
customer_reviews.author: djw

customer_reviews.title: The boxes are heavy and I need help getting
customer_reviews.text: I really like the black cherry .But the boxes that they are shipped in are falling apart and lose bottles in the box.I have been getting it for a long time I am disabled and asked if they can bring the products to me directly I'm not capable of getting them. I hope you can HELP me get them in a better way. Thank you Denise
customer_reviews.author: denise sautter

customer_reviews.title: Propel water
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize, but this has way to much salt in it 250mg omg. Won't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: A great drink!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you how excited I get when I receive my three cases of Propel from Amazon! Who wouldn’t? It’s the most delicious, nutritious water beverage I’ve ever had! The minute I open that box I start glugging it down and NEVER stop due to my subscription program with Amazon! Who ever imagined I’d fall in love with water!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great...no sugar
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that this is currently unavailable on Amazon. The distribution at local markets is very sporadic so I counted on Amazon for my supply. Have to go on the hunt again. I love the Berry flavor Propel, and the fact that it contains electrolytes is great. Fingers crossed that it will return soon.
customer_reviews.author: retired guy

customer_reviews.title: Flavor for Fun
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about trying these, but I'm glad I did. They're bursting with flavor and are very refreshing. I don't need to buy unhealthy soda anymore, and I can save money because I don't have to buy expensive juices anymore. I'll get these! I can't wait to try the other flacors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gatorades PROPEL is good tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Really good tasting, really good price, and the bottles are thicker than typical water bottles and great for reusing if you buy the Propel Packets.. With Amazons add on program you can buy this pretty righteous.. or get it with subscribe and save, or the pantry program.. this is good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a flavored water that tastes good but has no calories and no after taste and I found it in Propel water. I used to buy the powder form and mix it with water but I found that buying already made is cheaper. Kiwi strawberry and grape are my favorite flavors
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Coutu

customer_reviews.title: Love the Peach!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it tastes great and helps me to keep from drinking soda. I just wish I could find the peach flavor in the stores. A friend was lamenting about not being able to get this and I told her about ordering it online. It is great being able to get it all year instead of just in the warmer months when the local stores carry(even then they don't always have the peach flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Trick my kids into drinking water
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and shipping. I love this water the grape flavor is delicious it tastes like grape juice but no calories
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Pennick

customer_reviews.title: Back on a Propel kick!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t care what anyone says, berry propel is the best propel. I think the price on here is amazing. I’m on multiple packs now. I drink two or three bottles of it a day and it’s great for staying hydrated. Especially for me because I’m not a huge water drinker. Love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Propel kiwi strawberry is my fav drink!
customer_reviews.text: Propel Kiwi Strawberry just quenches my thirst and tastes better to me than any other brand or flavor. Ordering from Amazon Subscriptions, I save more than buying from the local stores. It’s not always in stock every month and I have to wait but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MCB catlady

customer_reviews.title: Been drinking for over 15 years. Best flavor. Please don't discontinue these Propel!!
customer_reviews.text: Been drinking these for over 15 years. Used to drink soda, but had to stop (thank God) for health reasons. Someone suggested these since I don't like the taste of plain water and I've been drinking them ever since. I buy cases at a time and it's all I drink. I've had to go through a couple flavor changes through the years as Propel discontinued certain flavors (mango, peach mango...) so hopefully they never discontinue this one. I also love the peach which is a little harder to find. Watermelon is my favorite however.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor is always advising me to lay off the sodas and drink more water. But if you are used to soda, water is pretty bland. This flavored water has just enough of the flavoring to satisfy and I am noticing I have more energy, I believe due to the electrolytes. The price is reasonable, working out to about 50 cents per bottle, which is certainly better than soda prices!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Red

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally reach for water beverages before others like iced tea or diet soda, but these Propel flavors have changed that. I drink much more water and feel better because of it! Great taste and quenches thirst. Highly recommend if you like flavored non-carbonated water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flavored water
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tasting water.If you like flavored water and are bored over drinking regular bottled water this is just the thing for you . And you can't beat the low price! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: steven k.

customer_reviews.title: Best way to drink your water
customer_reviews.text: I was ordered by my nephrologist to drink more water.... lots more water. But I hate water, so I went looking on Amazon for flavored water, and this appealed to me. Others have told me, since, that this is their favorite Propel flavor. I'm really liking it!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet for a zero calorie beverage
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure most people like this drink but for some reason it was way too sweet for me. And I was so looking forward to trying it for the first time. I'll stick to my Gatorade and zero-calorie sparkling water. Nothing wrong with it just did not suit my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Its not water
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a bottled water with berry flavor.. but This is too thick to be considered water and the taste of what they call berry flavor is an overwhelming concoction of I don't know what. I think it's disgusting. Live, shop and learn. I won't ever buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Moore

product_meta.title: Propel, Black Cherry, Zero Calorie Sports Drinking Water with Electrolytes and Vitamins C&E, 16.9 Fl Oz (12 Count)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Black Cherry| Size:16.9 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)Hydrate your workout with the refreshing taste of Propel Water Black Cherry Flavored Water with Electrolytes, Vitamins and No Sugar. A flavored water backed by the Gatorade Sports Science Institute, Propel Water has electrolytes, antioxidants and vitamins to help put back what you lose in sweat. It’s a delicious and refreshing way to hydrate your toughest workouts. Even better, Propel Water has no sugar, so you can hydrate your workout without adding back the calories you burned. This is how Gatorade does water.
feature_bullets: Hydrate your workout with the refreshing taste of Propel Water Black Cherry Flavored Water with Electrolytes, Vitamins and No Sugar. A flavored water backed by the Gatorade Sports Science Institute, Propel Water has electrolytes, antioxidants and vitamins to help put back what you lose in sweat. It’s a delicious and refreshing way to hydrate your toughest workouts. Even better, Propel Water has no sugar, so you can hydrate your workout without adding back the calories you burned.
Contains twelve (12) 16.9-oz. bottles of Propel Water Black Cherry Flavored Water with Electrolytes, Vitamins and No Sugar
Made with Gatorade electrolytes to put back what you lose in sweat
With zero sugar and zero calories, Propel Bottled Water helps you get the most out of your workout
Propel provides electrolytes and is an excellent source of vitamin B and antioxidant vitamins C and E
Propel Fitness Water comes in 11 delicious flavors, as well as Unflavored and Propel Powder Packets to add flavor to your workout

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
